import axios from 'axios'; import { useState } from 'react'; function ProjectProposal(){ const [service_start_date,setService_start_date]=useState('') const [service_end_date,setService_end_date]=useState('') const [category,setCategory]=useState('') const [target_price,setTarget_price]=useState(0) const [title,setTitle]=useState('') const [subtitle,setSubtitle]=useState([]) const [image_name,setImage]=useState([]) const [imageSrc, setImageSrc] = useState([]); const [imageLoading, setImageLoading] = useState(false); const [contents,setcontents]=useState([]) const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const Check=()=>{ } const onSubmitClick=()=>{ const data = new FormData(); data.append("service_start_date",service_start_date) data.append("service_end_date",service_end_date) data.append("category",category) data.append("target_price",target_price) data.append("title",title) data.append("subtitle",subtitle) data.append("image_name",image_name) data.append("contents",contents) axios.post("http://localhost:8090/save",data) .then((Response)=>{ console.log(Response) window.location.href="/"; }) .catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) }) } const onImageChange = (e) => { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(e.target.files[0]); //이미지 파일 ㅈ체를 여기에 저ㅏㅇ setImage(e.target.files[0]) setIndex(index + 1); return new Promise((resolve) => { reader.onload = () => { //결과를 src에 저장 const src = [...imageSrc]; src.push(reader.result); //배열로 이미지 소스에 집어 넣음 setImageSrc(src); setImageLoading(true); resolve(); }; }); }; return( <>
